fall guy.translation[0].definitions[0].d: someone who is punished for someone else’s crime or mistake
fall guy.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Browne claims that the company was simply looking for a fall guy.
fall guy.translation[0].definitions[1].d: someone who is easily tricked or made to seem stupid
fall guy.translation[1].definitions[0].d: someone who is punished for someone else’s mistakes
fall guy.translation[1].definitions[0].e: Like many fall guys, he was a loyal manager who was hardly the only person to blame for his employer’s troubles.
